name: 穿越迷宫世界 Cross the Maze World
name_original: 穿越迷宫世界 Cross the Maze World
description:
What kind of work is it?
Independently develop games, 3d games, and travel through the maze world to explore, kill monsters, and solve puzzles

Future:
There will be more and richer content in the future. I hope to create a large maze world in the future. I hope you will like it.
If you have any suggestions about the game, please leave a comment in the comment section. The author will try his best to listen to players' opinions and constantly improve the work

I wish you all a happy time and hope you enjoy it
developers: XINGGUO YOUYU FANGYUAN NETWORK TECHNOLOGY CO., LTD.
publishers: XINGGUO YOUYU FANGYUAN NETWORK TECHNOLOGY CO., LTD.
